content.question: Which of the following actions are appropriate when providing psychological first aid to an adult in distress?

answers.option: Calm the person, support their breathing, and help them maintain focus.
Tell them to stop shaking and force them to calm down.
Contact emergency services if help has not arrived yet.
Assist them to connect with supportive family or friends.
Grab them by the arm and remove them from the situation.

content.correct: Correct! Calm support, contacting help, and linking them to support are appropriate PFA actions.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answers are: Calm support, contact emergency services, and connect them with family or friends.
